description.overview: Nimbus Health Systems is a leading healthcare corporation specializing in patient-centric care and innovative medical solutions.
description.mission: To improve patient outcomes through cutting-edge technology and compassionate care.
description.history: Established in 1985, Nimbus has expanded to 45 hospitals nationwide and pioneered telemedicine platforms.
description.futureGoals: Expand AI-driven diagnostics and personalized treatment plans.
